item.title: How to redirect PreStop hook output to pod logs
item.description: You might have noticed that command output of PreStop hook wont appear in pod logs and only thing you can see is whether the PreStop hook command failed or not is by checking kubernetes events log.

item.title: HPA - How to gracefully scale down pods with PreStop hooks
item.description: One of our application running in kubernetes have a background job feature (which is a bad practice and against stateless architecture) and recently we noticed some of these background jobs were killed in midway due to pod scale-down done by horizontal pod autoscaler.
